embed.description: Had LOTS of fun playing Blitzcrank Support with my friend playing the famous "Blue Ezreal" haha. would love to try some full AP Blizcrank in this Season 6 :) ►► Subscribe to Join us on our Adventures!: ►https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCVjr676PJJDILJ1fXH496TQ CHECK US OUT @ ►Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/TwinzAU ►Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/TwinzAU ►Twitch: http://www.twitch.tv/TwinzAU

replies.body: Just like maccas, I'm loving it boys.
